trans-unit.source: Transforms XML data using an XSLT style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 使用 XSLT 样式表转换 XML 数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class is an XSLT processor that supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>类是支持的 XSLT 1.0 语法的 XSLT 处理器。

trans-unit.source: It is a new implementation and includes performance gains when compared to the obsolete <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: 它是新实现，并包含性能提升与过时相比<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>类。

trans-unit.source: The structure of the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class is very similar to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> class.
trans-unit.target: 结构<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>类是非常类似于<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method loads and compiles the style sheet, while the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method executes the XSLT transform.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>方法加载和编译样式表，而<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>方法执行 XSLT 转换。

trans-unit.source: Support for the XSLT `document()` function and embedded script blocks are disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: XSLT 支持`document()`函数以及嵌入式的脚本块默认处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: These features can be enabled by creating an <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings> object and passing it to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过创建启用这些功能<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings>对象并将其传递给<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the XslCompiledTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md) and [Migrating From the XslTransform Class](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用 XslCompiledTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/using-the-xslcompiledtransform-class.md)和[迁移从 XslTransform 类](~/docs/standard/data/xml/migrating-from-the-xsltransform-class.md)。

trans-unit.source: Security Considerations
trans-unit.target: 安全注意事项

trans-unit.source: When creating an application that uses the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class, you should be aware of the following items and their implications:
trans-unit.target: 在创建使用 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> 类的应用程序时，应了解下列项及其含义：

trans-unit.source: XSLT scripting is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下禁用 XSLT 脚本。

trans-unit.source: XSLT scripting should be enabled only if you require script support and you are working in a fully trusted environment.
trans-unit.target: 只有要求脚本支持并且处于完全可信的环境下时，才应启用 XSLT 脚本。

trans-unit.source: The XSLT `document()` function is disabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下禁用 XSLT `document()` 函数。

trans-unit.source: If you enable the `document()` function, restrict the resources that can be accessed by passing an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用 `document()` 函数，通过将 <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> 对象传递给 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> 方法，限制可以访问的资源。

trans-unit.source: Extension objects are enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下启用扩展对象。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList> object containing extension objects is passed to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method, they are utilized.
trans-unit.target: 如果包含扩展对象的 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList> 对象传递给 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> 方法，将利用这些扩展对象。

trans-unit.source: XSLT style sheets can include references to other files and embedded script blocks.
trans-unit.target: XSLT 样式表可以包括对其他文件的引用以及嵌入式脚本块。

trans-unit.source: A malicious user can exploit this by supplying you with data or style sheets that when executed can cause your system to process until the computer runs low on resources.
trans-unit.target: 恶意用户可能会利用这一点，方法是为您提供数据或样式表，在执行时，可能会使您的系统不断进行处理，直到计算机资源不足。

trans-unit.source: XSLT applications that run in a mixed trust environment can result in style sheet spoofing.
trans-unit.target: 在混合信任环境下运行的 XSLT 应用程序可能会引发样式表欺骗。

trans-unit.source: For example, a malicious user can load an object with a harmful style sheet and hand it off to another user who subsequently calls the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method and executes the transformation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，恶意用户可能会为对象加载有害的样式表，并将其交给另一个用户，而后者会继续调用 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> 方法并执行转换。

trans-unit.source: These security issues can be mitigated by not enabling scripting or the `document()` function unless the style sheet comes from a trusted source, and by not accepting <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> objects, XSLT style sheets, or XML source data from an untrusted source.
trans-unit.target: 如果不启用脚本或 `document()` 函数（除非样式表来自可信的源），或不接受来自不可信的源的 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> 对象、XSLT 样式表或 XML 源数据，可以缓解这些安全问题。

trans-unit.source: The following example executes a transform and outputs to a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例执行转换，然后将输出到文件。

trans-unit.source: The sample uses the following two input files:
trans-unit.target: 此示例使用以下两个输入的文件：

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform" /> object is thread safe once it has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform" />对象是线程安全的已加载后。

trans-unit.source: In other words, after the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load" /> method has successfully completed, the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform" /> method can be called simultaneously from multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之之后,<see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load" />方法已成功完成，<see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform" />方法可以从多个线程同时调用。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load" /> method is called again in one thread while the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform" /> method is being called in another thread, the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform" /> object finishes executing the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform" /> call by continuing to use the old state.
trans-unit.target: 如果<see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load" />方法时的一个线程中再次调用<see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform" />另一线程中调用方法<see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform" />对象完成执行<see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform" />调用继续使用旧的状态。

trans-unit.source: The new state is used when the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load" /> method successfully completes.
trans-unit.target: 使用新的状态时<see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load" />方法已成功完成。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load" /> method is not thread safe when called simultaneously from multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load" />方法不是线程安全的同时从多个线程调用时。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to generate debug information; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 生成调试信息时为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting this to <see langword="true" /> enables you to debug the style sheet with the Microsoft Visual Studio Debugger.
trans-unit.target: 如果将其设置为 <see langword="true" />，您就可以使用 Microsoft Visual Studio 调试器对样式表进行调试。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform" /> class with the specified debug setting.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的调试设置初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following conditions must be met in order to step into the code and debug the style sheet:
trans-unit.target: 以单步执行代码，调试样式表，必须满足以下条件：

trans-unit.source: The `enableDebug` parameter is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `enableDebug` 参数设置为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: The style sheet is passed to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method either as a URI, or an implementation of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> class that implements the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo> interface.
trans-unit.target: 样式表传递给<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>方法作为一个 URI 或实现<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>类，该类实现<xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo>接口。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo> interface is implemented on all text-parsing <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo>接口实现上所有的文本分析<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象。

trans-unit.source: In other words, if the style sheet is loaded using an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> object, such as an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>, or an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> implementation that does not implement the <xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo> interface, you cannot debug the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，如果使用加载样式表<xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable>对象，如<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>或<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>，或<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>不实现的实现<xref:System.Xml.IXmlLineInfo>接口，你无法调试样式表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> used to load the style sheet is a file-based <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>, such as the <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> (this is the default <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> used by the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>用于加载样式表是基于文件的<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>，如<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>(这是默认<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>由<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>类)。

trans-unit.source: The style sheet is located on the local machine or on the intranet.
trans-unit.target: 样式表是位于本地计算机上，也可以在 intranet 上。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to enable XSLT debugging.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何启用 XSLT 调试。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> positioned at the beginning of the style sheet to be compiled.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />，位于要编译的样式表开头。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings" /> to be applied to the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 要应用于样式表的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings" />。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="P:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.Default" /> will be applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="null" />，将应用 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.Default" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> use to resolve style sheet modules referenced in <see langword="xsl:import" /> and <see langword="xsl:include" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> 用于解析 <see langword="xsl:import" /> 和 <see langword="xsl:include" /> 元素中引用的样式表模块。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see langword="null" />, external resources will not be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="null" />，将不解析外部资源。

trans-unit.source: Setting this to <see langword="true" /> enables debugging the style sheet with a debugger.
trans-unit.target: 将它设置为 <see langword="true" /> 即可使用调试器调试样式表。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" /> used for the style sheet compilation.
trans-unit.target: 用于样式表编译的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder" />。

trans-unit.source: The provided TypeBuilder is used to generate the resulting type.
trans-unit.target: 提供的 TypeBuilder 用于生成结果类型。

trans-unit.source: The base path for the assemblies generated for <see langword="msxsl:script" /> elements.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see langword="msxsl:script" /> 元素生成的程序集的基路径。

trans-unit.source: If only one script assembly is generated, this parameter specifies the path for that assembly.
trans-unit.target: 如果仅生成了一个脚本程序集，此参数将指定该程序集的路径。

trans-unit.source: In case of multiple script assemblies, a distinctive suffix will be appended to the file name to ensure uniqueness of assembly names.
trans-unit.target: 如果生成了多个脚本程序集，将对文件名追加特殊的后缀，以确保程序集名称的唯一性。

trans-unit.source: Compiles an XSLT style sheet to a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 将 XSLT 样式表编译为指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection" /> object containing compiler errors and warnings that indicate the results of the compilation.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection" /> 对象，包含指示编译结果的编译器错误和警告。

trans-unit.source: The `xsltc.exe` tool is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.CompileToType%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `xsltc.exe`工具是周围的包装器<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.CompileToType%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Compiling style sheets with the `xsltc.exe` will meet the demands of most applications that leverage the use of compiled style sheets.
trans-unit.target: 编译样式表与`xsltc.exe`将满足大部分利用已编译的样式表使用的应用程序的要求。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.CompileToType%2A> method should be used when building custom compilation tools.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.CompileToType%2A>方法应构建自定义编译工具时使用。

trans-unit.source: Compiles the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 编译样式表。

trans-unit.source: Although the overall performance of the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class is better than the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> class, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class might perform more slowly than the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> class the first time it is called on a transformation.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> 类的总体性能优于 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> 类，但在首次对转换调用时，<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> 类的 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> 方法可能比 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform.Load%2A> 类的 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslTransform> 方法慢。

trans-unit.source: This is because the XSLT file must be compiled before it is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为必须先编译 XSLT 文件，才能加载该文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the following blog post: [XslCompiledTransform Slower than XslTransform?](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=130590)
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅以下博客文章：[XslCompiledTransform 比 XslTransform 慢？](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=130590)

trans-unit.source: There are differences between XSLT compiled in Debug mode and XSLT compiled in Release mode.
trans-unit.target: 以调试模式编译的 XSLT 与以发布模式编译的 XSLT 之间有一些差别。

trans-unit.source: In some situations, style sheets compiled in Debug mode will not throw errors during <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>, but will later fail during <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在有些情况下，以调试模式编译的样式表在 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> 期间不会引发错误，但以后在 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> 期间会失败。

trans-unit.source: The same style sheet compiled in Release mode will fail during <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 以发布模式编译的同一个样式表在 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> 期间就会失败。

trans-unit.source: An example of such behavior is when a variable that is not of a node-set type is assigned to an expression where a node-set is required.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当某个表达式需要节点集，而分配给该表达式的变量不是节点集类型的时，就会出现这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 样式表的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Loads and compiles the style sheet located at the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: 加载和编译位于指定 URI 的样式表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>类支持的 XSLT 1.0 语法。

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must use the `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform` namespace.
trans-unit.target: XSLT 样式表必须使用`http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`命名空间。

trans-unit.source: This method has the following behavior:
trans-unit.target: 此方法具有以下行为：

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials is used to resolve the style sheet URI, and process any `xsl:import` or `xsl:include` elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>无用户凭据用于解析样式表的 URI，并处理所有`xsl:import`或`xsl:include`元素。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> with default settings is used to load the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>使用默认设置用于加载样式表。

trans-unit.source: DTD processing is disabled on the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: 在上禁用 DTD 处理<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。

trans-unit.source: If you require DTD processing, create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> with this feature enabled, and pass it to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要 DTD 处理，则创建<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>启用了此功能后，并将其传递到<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `document()` function is disabled.
trans-unit.target: `document()`函数处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Embedded scripts are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持嵌入的脚本。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%28System.String%2CSystem.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%29> overload to specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary authentication credentials, or to specify different XSLT settings.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%28System.String%2CSystem.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%29>重载来指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>使用必要的身份验证的凭据，或指定不同的 XSLT 设置。

trans-unit.source: The following example executes a transform and outputs to a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例执行转换，然后将输出到文件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="stylesheetUri" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stylesheetUri" /> 值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The style sheet contains an error.
trans-unit.target: 样式表中有错。

trans-unit.source: The style sheet cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 无法找到该样式表。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="stylesheetUri" /> value includes a filename or directory that cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stylesheetUri" /> 值包含无法找到的文件名或目录。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="stylesheetUri" /> value cannot be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 无法解析 <paramref name="stylesheetUri" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while processing the request.
trans-unit.target: 处理请求时出错。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stylesheetUri" /> is not a valid URI.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stylesheetUri" /> 不是有效的 URI。

trans-unit.source: There was a parsing error loading the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 加载样式表时出现分析错误。

trans-unit.source: The name of the class that contains the compiled style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 包含已编译样式表的类的名称。

trans-unit.source: This is usually the name of the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 该名称通常是样式表的名称。

trans-unit.source: Unless otherwise specified, the xsltc.exe tool uses the name of the style sheet for the class and assembly names.
trans-unit.target: 除非另外指定，否则，xsltc.exe 工具将样式表名称用作类和程序集的名称。

trans-unit.source: Loads the compiled style sheet that was created using the [XSLT Compiler (xsltc.exe)](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-compiler-xsltc-exe.md).
trans-unit.target: 加载使用 [XSLT 编译器 (xsltc.exe)](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-compiler-xsltc-exe.md) 创建的已编译样式表。

trans-unit.source: The xsltc.exe tool is used to compile style sheets and generate assemblies from the style sheets.
trans-unit.target: Xsltc.exe 工具用于编译样式表并从样式表生成程序集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method loads the compiled style sheet from the assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>方法加载程序集中的已编译的样式表。

trans-unit.source: You must also include the XSLT assembly as a reference in your application.
trans-unit.target: 您还必须在你的应用程序中包含作为引用的 XSLT 程序集。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to load a compiled style sheet from an XSLT assembly.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何从 XSLT 程序集加载已编译的样式表。

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that the xsltc.exe tool was used to create an assembly named bookOrders.dll with a class named bookOrders.
trans-unit.target: 该示例假定 xsltc.exe 工具已用于创建一个名为 bookOrders 类的名为 bookOrders.dll 程序集。

trans-unit.source: You have to reference the XSLT assembly when compiling the code.
trans-unit.target: 你必须在编译代码时引用 XSLT 程序集。

trans-unit.source: For example, `csc /r:system.dll;system.xml.dll;bookOrders.dll myCode.cs`.
trans-unit.target: 例如 `csc /r:system.dll;system.xml.dll;bookOrders.dll myCode.cs`。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> containing the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 包含此样式表的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Compiles the style sheet contained in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 编译 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 中包含的样式表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>类支持的 XSLT 1.0 语法。

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must use the `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform` namespace.
trans-unit.target: XSLT 样式表必须使用`http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The style sheet loads from the current node of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> through all its children.
trans-unit.target: 从当前节点的加载样式表<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>通过其所有子级。

trans-unit.source: This enables you to use a portion of a document as the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 这使您要用作样式表文档的一部分。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method completes, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is positioned on the next node after the end of the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>方法完成时，<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>样式表末尾后定位到下一个节点。

trans-unit.source: If the end of the document is reached, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is positioned at the end of file (EOF).
trans-unit.target: 如果已到达文档结尾，<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> 将位于文件结尾 (EOF)。

trans-unit.source: This method has the following behavior:
trans-unit.target: 此方法具有以下行为：

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials is used to process any `xsl:import` or `xsl:include` elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>无用户凭据用于处理任何`xsl:import`或`xsl:include`元素。

trans-unit.source: The `document()` function is disabled.
trans-unit.target: `document()`函数处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Embedded scripts are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持嵌入的脚本。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%29> overload to specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary authentication credentials, or to specify different XSLT settings.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%28System.Xml.XmlReader%2CSystem.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings%2CSystem.Xml.XmlResolver%29>重载来指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>使用必要的身份验证的凭据，或指定不同的 XSLT 设置。

trans-unit.source: The following example loads a style sheet contained in an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例加载样式表中包含<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="stylesheet" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stylesheet" /> 值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The style sheet contains an error.
trans-unit.target: 样式表中有错。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> 接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft .NET Framework, this can be either an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> (typically an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />), or an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument" /> containing the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 在 Microsoft .NET Framework 中，这可以是 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />（一般为 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />），或者是包含该样式表的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: Compiles the style sheet contained in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 编译 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> 对象中包含的样式表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>类支持的 XSLT 1.0 语法。

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must use the `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform` namespace.
trans-unit.target: XSLT 样式表必须使用`http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`命名空间。

trans-unit.source: This method has the following behavior:
trans-unit.target: 此方法具有以下行为：

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials is used to process any `xsl:import` or `xsl:include` elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>无用户凭据用于处理任何`xsl:import`或`xsl:include`元素。

trans-unit.source: The `document()` function is disabled.
trans-unit.target: `document()`函数处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: Embedded scripts are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持嵌入的脚本。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> overload to specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary authentication credentials, or to specify different XSLT settings.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>重载来指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>使用必要的身份验证的凭据，或指定不同的 XSLT 设置。

trans-unit.source: The following example loads a style sheet contained in an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例加载样式表中包含<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="stylesheet" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stylesheet" /> 值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The style sheet contains an error.
trans-unit.target: 样式表中有错。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> object representing the compiler-generated <c>execute</c> method of the compiled style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.MethodInfo" /> 对象，表示已编译样式表中由编译器生成的 <c>execute</c> 方法。

trans-unit.source: A byte array of serialized data structures in the <c>staticData</c> field of the compiled style sheet as generated by the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.CompileToType(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings,System.Xml.XmlResolver,System.Boolean,System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder,System.String)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 已编译样式表的 <c>staticData</c> 字段中的一个序列化数据结构字节数组，该已编译样式表由 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.CompileToType(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings,System.Xml.XmlResolver,System.Boolean,System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder,System.String)" /> 方法生成。

trans-unit.source: An array of types stored in the compiler-generated <c>ebTypes</c> field of the compiled style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型数组，该数组存储在已编译样式表中由编译器生成的 <c>ebTypes</c> 字段中。

trans-unit.source: Loads a method from a style sheet compiled using the <see langword="XSLTC.exe" /> utility.
trans-unit.target: 从使用 <see langword="XSLTC.exe" /> 实用程序编译的样式表中加载一个方法。

trans-unit.source: This method accepts a compiled style sheet in the form of a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> object, a byte array, and a type array.
trans-unit.target: 此方法接受形式的已编译的样式表<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>对象、 字节数组和一个类型数组。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod> objects may be used to allow compiled style sheet methods to be discarded when the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> object is reclaimed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Reflection.Emit.DynamicMethod> 对象可用于允许已编译的样式表方法要被丢弃时<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>回收对象。

trans-unit.source: The code example below uses the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> to load a compiled style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 使用下面的代码示例<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>加载已编译的样式表。

trans-unit.source: The transformation reduces the value of the `Price` element by ten percent.
trans-unit.target: 转换可以减少的值`Price`10%的元素。

trans-unit.source: The "Transform" assembly used in this example was built using the xsltc.exe utility.
trans-unit.target: 此示例中使用"转换"程序集是使用 xsltc.exe 实用程序生成的。

trans-unit.source: For detailed information on using this command line tool, see [How to: Perform an XSLT Transformation by Using an Assembly](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-perform-an-xslt-transformation-by-using-an-assembly.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用此命令行工具的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 通过使用程序集执行 XSLT 转换](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-perform-an-xslt-transformation-by-using-an-assembly.md)。

trans-unit.source: The code example above uses the following transformation:
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码示例使用以下转换：

trans-unit.source: The URI of the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 样式表的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings" /> to apply to the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 应用于样式表的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings" />。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="P:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.Default" /> setting is applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 <see langword="null" />，则应用 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.Default" /> 设置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> used to resolve the style sheet URI and any style sheets referenced in XSLT <c>import</c> and <c>include</c> elements.
trans-unit.target: 用于解析样式表 URI 的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> 以及在 XSLT <c>import</c> 和 <c>include</c> 元素中引用的任何样式表。

trans-unit.source: Loads and compiles the XSLT style sheet specified by the URI.
trans-unit.target: 加载和编译 URI 指定的 XSLT 样式表。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> resolves any XSLT <c>import</c> or <c>include</c> elements and the XSLT settings determine the permissions for the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> 可以解析任何 XSLT <c>import</c> 或 <c>include</c> 元素，而 XSLT 设置决定了样式表的权限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform> class supports the XSLT 1.0 syntax.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform>类支持的 XSLT 1.0 语法。

trans-unit.source: The XSLT style sheet must use the `http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform` namespace.
trans-unit.target: XSLT 样式表必须使用`http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform`命名空间。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> with default settings is used to load the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>使用默认设置用于加载样式表。

trans-unit.source: DTD processing is disabled on the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: 在上禁用 DTD 处理<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>。

trans-unit.source: If you require DTD processing, create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> with this feature enabled, and pass it to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要 DTD 处理，则创建<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>启用了此功能后，并将其传递到<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example loads a style sheet that is stored on a network resource.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例加载存储在网络资源的样式表。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> object specifies the credentials necessary to access the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> 对象指定访问该样式表所需的凭据。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="stylesheetUri" /> or <paramref name="stylesheetResolver" /> value is <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The style sheet contains an error.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while processing the request.
trans-unit.target: 处理请求时出错。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stylesheetUri" /> is not a valid URI.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stylesheetUri" /> 不是有效的 URI。

trans-unit.source: There was a parsing error loading the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 加载样式表时出现分析错误。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> containing the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 包含该样式表的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings" /> to apply to the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 应用于样式表的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings" />。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="P:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.Default" /> setting is applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果是 <see langword="null" />，则应用 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltSettings.Default" /> 设置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> used to resolve any style sheets referenced in XSLT <c>import</c> and <c>include</c> elements.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />，用于解析 XSLT <c>import</c> 和 <c>include</c> 元素中引用的所有样式表。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see langword="null" />, external resources are not resolved.

trans-unit.source: Compiles the XSLT style sheet contained in the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 编译 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 中包含的 XSLT 样式表。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> resolves any XSLT <c>import</c> or <c>include</c> elements and the XSLT settings determine the permissions for the style sheet.

trans-unit.target: 它包含派生自的信息`xsl:output`的已编译的样式表的元素。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings> object can be passed to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object to which you want to output.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings>可以将对象传递给<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Create%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法来创建<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>你想要输出的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.OutputSettings%2A> property to create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object that writes text to the console.

trans-unit.source: The example uses the `books.xml` and `outputConsole.xsl` files as input.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用`books.xml`和`outputConsole.xsl`文件作为输入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> that contains the temporary files generated on disk after a successful call to the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含临时文件的 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" />，这些临时文件是在成功调用 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load" /> 方法后在磁盘上生成的。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> that contains the temporary files generated on disk.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> 包含在磁盘上生成的临时文件。

trans-unit.source: This value is <see langword="null" /> if the <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load" /> method has not been successfully called, or if debugging has not been enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果调用 <see cref="Overload:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load" /> 方法不成功或者尚未启用调试，则此值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property identifies the files that were generated during XSLT processing.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将标识 XSLT 期间生成的文件处理。

trans-unit.source: The files are placed in your Temp directory (specified by the %TEMP% environment variable) You can delete these files after the XSLT processing has completed.
trans-unit.target: 文件放置在 Temp 目录 （由 %TEMP%环境变量指定） 你可以删除这些文件，XSLT 处理完成后。

trans-unit.source: The following example writes the names of temporary files to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例将临时文件的名称写入控制台。

trans-unit.source: Temporary files are created only when loading style sheets with \<msxsl:script> blocks.
trans-unit.target: 仅当与加载样式表创建临时文件\<msxsl: script > 块。

trans-unit.source: Executes the XSLT transformation.
trans-unit.target: 执行 XSLT 转换。

trans-unit.source: There are differences between XSLT compiled in Debug mode and XSLT compiled in Release mode.
trans-unit.target: 以调试模式编译的 XSLT 与以发布模式编译的 XSLT 之间有一些差别。

trans-unit.source: In some situations, style sheets compiled in Debug mode will not throw errors during <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>, but will later fail during <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在有些情况下，以调试模式编译的样式表在 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> 期间不会引发错误，但以后在 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> 期间会失败。

trans-unit.source: The same style sheet compiled in Release mode will fail during <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 以发布模式编译的同一个样式表在 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> 期间就会失败。

trans-unit.source: An example of such behavior is when a variable that is not of a node-set type is assigned to an expression where a node-set is required.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当某个表达式需要节点集，而分配给该表达式的变量不是节点集类型的时，就会出现这种情况。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the input document.

trans-unit.target: 如果任何这些资源都位于需要身份验证的网络资源，请使用采用的重载<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>作为其自变量之一并指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>使用必要的凭据。

trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> 接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft .NET Framework, this can be either an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> (typically an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />), or an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument" /> containing the data to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: 在 Microsoft .NET Framework 中，这可以是 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />（一般为 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />），或者是包含要转换的数据的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument" />。

trans-unit.target: 要输出到的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.target: 如果样式表包含 <c>xsl:output</c> 元素，则应使用由 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.OutputSettings" /> 属性返回的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings" /> 对象来创建 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: If the XSLT `document()` function is enabled, it is resolved using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XSLT`document()`启用功能，则会得到解决使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>使用没有用户凭据。

trans-unit.source: If the external resource is located on a network resource that requires authentication, use the overload that takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> as one of its arguments and specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary credentials.

trans-unit.target: 此方法不支持`xsl:strip-space`元素。

trans-unit.source: If your compiled style sheet included the `xsl:strip-space` element, you must use the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> overload which takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> as the input argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果你已编译的样式表包含`xsl:strip-space`元素，则必须使用<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>重载此方法采用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>作为输入参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface is implemented in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> 接口在 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> 和 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> 类中实现。

trans-unit.source: These classes represent an in-memory cache of XML data.
trans-unit.target: 这两个类表示 XML 数据的内存中缓存。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class is based on the W3C Document Object Model (DOM) and includes editing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> 类基于 W3C 文档对象模型 (DOM) 并具有编辑功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> class is a read-only data store based on the XPath data model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> 类是基于 XPath 数据模型的只读数据存储。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> is the recommended class for XSLT processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> 是 XSLT 处理建议使用的类。

trans-unit.source: It provides faster performance when compared to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class.
trans-unit.target: 与 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> 类相比，此类的性能更强。

trans-unit.source: Transformations apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: 转换将应用于整个文档。

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: 换句话说，如果你传入文档根节点以外的一个节点，并不能防止转换进程访问已加载文档的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: To transform a node fragment, you must create an object containing just the node fragment, and pass that object to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要转换节点片段，必须创建一个仅包含节点片段的对象，并将该对象传递给 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Transform a Node Fragment](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-transform-a-node-fragment.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：转换节点片断](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-transform-a-node-fragment.md)。

trans-unit.source: If your compiled style sheet included the `xsl:strip-space` element, you must use the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> overload which takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> as the input argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果你已编译的样式表包含`xsl:strip-space`元素，则必须使用<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>重载此方法采用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>作为输入参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface is implemented in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> 接口在 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> 和 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> 类中实现。

trans-unit.source: These classes represent an in-memory cache of XML data.
trans-unit.target: 这两个类表示 XML 数据的内存中缓存。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class is based on the W3C Document Object Model (DOM) and includes editing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> 类基于 W3C 文档对象模型 (DOM) 并具有编辑功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> class is a read-only data store based on the XPath data model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> 类是基于 XPath 数据模型的只读数据存储。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> is the recommended class for XSLT processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> 是 XSLT 处理建议使用的类。

trans-unit.source: It provides faster performance when compared to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class.
trans-unit.target: 与 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> 类相比，此类的性能更强。

trans-unit.source: Transformations apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: 转换将应用于整个文档。

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: 换句话说，如果你传入文档根节点以外的一个节点，并不能防止转换进程访问已加载文档的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: To transform a node fragment, you must create an object containing just the node fragment, and pass that object to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要转换节点片段，必须创建一个仅包含节点片段的对象，并将该对象传递给 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Transform a Node Fragment](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-transform-a-node-fragment.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：转换节点片断](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-transform-a-node-fragment.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example executes an XSLT transformation and outputs to a <xref:System.IO.FileStream>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例执行 XSLT 转换，并输出到<xref:System.IO.FileStream>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="input" /> or <paramref name="results" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 或 <paramref name="results" /> 值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: There was an error executing the XSLT transform.
trans-unit.target: 执行 XSLT 转换时出错。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> 接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft .NET Framework, this can be either an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> (typically an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />), or an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument" /> containing the data to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: 在 Microsoft .NET Framework 中，这可以是 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" />（一般为 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />），或者是包含要转换的数据的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> containing the namespace-qualified arguments used as input to the transform.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" />，包含用作转换输入的命名空间限定的参数。

trans-unit.source: This value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值可为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> to which you want to output.
trans-unit.target: 要输出到的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Executes the transform using the input document specified by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> object and outputs the results to an <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> 对象指定的输入文档执行转换，然后将结果输出到 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> provides additional run-time arguments.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> 提供附加的运行时参数。

trans-unit.source: If the XSLT `document()` function is enabled, it is resolved using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> with no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XSLT`document()`启用功能，则会得到解决使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>使用没有用户凭据。

trans-unit.source: If the external resource is located on a network resource that requires authentication, use the overload that takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> as one of its arguments and specify an <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> with the necessary credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要身份验证的网络资源位于外部的资源，则请使用采用的重载<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>作为其自变量之一并指定<xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>使用必要的凭据。

trans-unit.source: This method does not support the `xsl:strip-space` element.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不支持`xsl:strip-space`元素。

trans-unit.source: If your compiled style sheet included the `xsl:strip-space` element, you must use the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> overload which takes an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> as the input argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果你已编译的样式表包含`xsl:strip-space`元素，则必须使用<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>重载此方法采用<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>作为输入参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> interface is implemented in the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> classes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> 接口在 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> 和 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> 类中实现。

trans-unit.source: These classes represent an in-memory cache of XML data.
trans-unit.target: 这两个类表示 XML 数据的内存中缓存。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class is based on the W3C Document Object Model (DOM) and includes editing capabilities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> 类基于 W3C 文档对象模型 (DOM) 并具有编辑功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> class is a read-only data store based on the XPath data model.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> 类是基于 XPath 数据模型的只读数据存储。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> is the recommended class for XSLT processing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> 是 XSLT 处理建议使用的类。

trans-unit.source: It provides faster performance when compared to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> class.
trans-unit.target: 与 <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> 类相比，此类的性能更强。

trans-unit.source: Transformations apply to the document as a whole.
trans-unit.target: 转换将应用于整个文档。

trans-unit.source: In other words, if you pass in a node other than the document root node, this does not prevent the transformation process from accessing all nodes in the loaded document.
trans-unit.target: 换句话说，如果你传入文档根节点以外的一个节点，并不能防止转换进程访问已加载文档的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: To transform a node fragment, you must create an object containing just the node fragment, and pass that object to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要转换节点片段，必须创建一个仅包含节点片段的对象，并将该对象传递给 <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Transform a Node Fragment](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-transform-a-node-fragment.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：转换节点片断](~/docs/standard/data/xml/how-to-transform-a-node-fragment.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="input" /> or <paramref name="results" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 或 <paramref name="results" /> 值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: There was an error executing the XSLT transform.
trans-unit.target: 执行 XSLT 转换时出错。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> 接口的对象。

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft .NET Framework, this can be either an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlNode" /> (typically an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" />), or an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument" /> containing the data to be transformed.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> containing the namespace-qualified arguments used as input to the transform.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" />，包含用作转换输入的命名空间限定的参数。

trans-unit.source: This value can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 此值可为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to which you want to output.
trans-unit.target: 要输出到的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: If the style sheet contains an <c>xsl:output</c> element, you should create the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> using the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings" /> object returned from the <see cref="P:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.OutputSettings" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果样式表包含 <c>xsl:output</c> 元素，则应使用由 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.OutputSettings" /> 属性返回的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings" /> 对象来创建 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> has the correct output settings.
trans-unit.target: 这样可以确保 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> 的输出设置是正确的。

trans-unit.source: Executes the transform using the input document specified by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> object and outputs the results to an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> 对象指定的输入文档执行转换，然后将结果输出到 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 或 <paramref name="results" /> 值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 执行 XSLT 转换时出错。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> containing the input document.
trans-unit.target: 包含输入文档的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> containing the namespace-qualified arguments used as input to the transform.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> used to resolve the XSLT <c>document()</c> function.
trans-unit.target: 用于解析 XSLT <c>document()</c> 函数的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" />。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see langword="null" />, the <c>document()</c> function is not resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="null" />，则不解析 <c>document()</c> 函数。

trans-unit.source: Executes the transform using the input document specified by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object and outputs the results to an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 对象指定的输入文档执行转换，然后将结果输出到 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> provides additional run-time arguments and the XmlResolver resolves the XSLT <c>document()</c> function.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> 提供附加的运行时参数，而 XmlResolver 解析 XSLT <c>document()</c> 函数。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver> to resolve the XSLT `document()` function.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver>来解析 XSLT`document()`函数。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="input" /> or <paramref name="results" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 或 <paramref name="results" /> 值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: There was an error executing the XSLT transform.
trans-unit.target: 执行 XSLT 转换时出错。

trans-unit.source: The document to transform that is specified by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> 对象指定的要转换的文档。

trans-unit.source: Argument list as <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> 形式的参数列表。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to which you want to output.
trans-unit.target: 要输出到的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: If the style sheet contains an <see langword="xsl:output" /> element, you should create the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> by using the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings" /> object that is returned from the <see cref="P:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.OutputSettings" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果样式表包含 <see langword="xsl:output" /> 元素，则应使用由 <see cref="P:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.OutputSettings" /> 属性返回的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriterSettings" /> 对象来创建 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: If this is <see langword="null" />, the <see langword="document()" /> function is not resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="null" />，则不解析 <see langword="document()" /> 函数。

trans-unit.source: Executes the transform by using the input document that is specified by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> object and outputs the results to an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable" /> 对象指定的输入文档执行转换，然后将结果输出到 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> provides additional run-time arguments and the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> resolves the XSLT <see langword="document()" /> function.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> 提供附加的运行时参数，而 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlResolver" /> 解析 XSLT <see langword="document()" /> 函数。
